org.compiere.plaf
Class CompierePLAF

java.lang.Object
  org.compiere.plaf.CompierePLAF

public final class CompierePLAF
extends java.lang.Object

Variable Pluggable Look And Feel. Provides an easy access to the required currently active PLAF information

Version:
$Id: CompierePLAF.java,v 1.35 2005/03/11 20:34:36 jjanke Exp $
Author:
Comunidad de Desarrollo openXpertya *Basado en Codigo Original Modificado, Revisado y Optimizado de: * Jorg Janke
